message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $150 to you, but we're starting the negotiation at $120. Let me know if this works for you!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your product and would like to make a counteroffer of $105.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your interest in the product, and I'd like to make a counteroffer of $115. This is my best offer, given the value of the product to you.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $110.
Thank you for your latest proposal, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept $110 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise considering its value to you.
